segments.text: I think it’s kind of funny how the woman is just standing there, oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and it’s almost cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the boy is stretching so far to reach the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the water is overflowing is almost like a cartoon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how ridiculous this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s expression is so serious, and it just makes the scene even funnier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll actually get away with taking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing feels like a comedy of errors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn’t tip over, but it would be kind of funny if it did.
segments.speaker: PAR
